data.name: CASH Connect Account
data.description: The CASH Connect Account is an at call transaction account designed to allow customers the flexibility of accessing their funds at any time while offering a standard variable base rate interest. The CASH Connect Account is a ?transaction account? that can be linked to the eWRAP Investments Account, or held as a standalone at call transaction account. When linked to a eWRAP Investment Account, the CASH Connect Account is used to settle managed fund and equity trades, as well as facilitate transactions and consequent cash movements including the receipt of deposits and payment of fees.

features.additionalInfo: Maximum daily withdrawal applies and is dependent on type of withdrawal requested.
Internet Banking, BPAY withdrawal, Phone Banking, Regular scheduled transfers through Internet Banking facilities and periodic payments are available.
Statements issued every six months, or more often if required.
Telegraphic transfers, Real time gross settlement, Bank Drafts, Direct Debits Deposits facilities are  available for this products.
Cash is available at St. George Bank or BankSA Branches immediately
Telegraphic Transfers via Internet Banking can be done and maximum daily withdrawal limit is $50,000.
The product includes fraud protection features.

Phone banking transfer, internet banking transfer, Regular scheduled transfer through internet banking are the withdrawal methods supported and the total limit across these methods is :$2,000,000 to your Nominated Account via Internet and Phone Banking, and $5,000 to a payee account up to a total of $25,000 across all payee accounts where the payee accounts are set up online.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Only available to investors who receives the Product Disclosure Statement in Australia, whether in hard copy or electronically.

fees.name: Internet and Phone Banking withdrawals
fees.additionalInfo: 10 free per month (this includes cheque withdrawal as well), thereafter $0.35 per Phone and Internet withdrawal

fees.name: Cheque Withdrawal
fees.additionalInfo: 10 free per month (this includes internet and phone banking withdrawal as well), thereafter $1 per cheque withdrawal.

fees.name: ATM Withdrawal And Balance Inquiry
fees.additionalInfo: St. George Bank, BankSA or Westpac branded ATM withdrawal or balance enquiry within Australia. Only applicable to customers who holds an existing VISA Debit Card.

fees.name: Certificate of interest paid or received
Telegraphic, telephone or mail advice of fate request
fees.additionalInfo: $12.00 each item, plus cost of message . This fees and charges include GST and are deducted from your Cash Account at the time the relevant transaction occurs. Before requesting any of these services, you should check with our Customer Relations team whether they are currently offered.

fees.name: Collection of cheques not lodged for credit to an account
Real Time Gross Settlement (RTGS)
fees.additionalInfo: This fees and charges include GST and are deducted from your Cash Account at the time the relevant transaction occurs. Before requesting any of these services, you should check with our Customer Relations team whether they are currently offered.
